levels.description:
Immediately deals <@ba.vup>{success.atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to all nearby enemies and disables their special abilities for <@ba.vup>{success.silence}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>Has a {prob:0%} chance to fail, instead <$ba.stun>Stunning</> all allied units within range for {failure.stun} seconds</>
